Room.Name: Adlermann Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Adlerman Way, just west of the Bendine Aquarium and Marina.
Room.LongDescription: The large Bendine Aquarium and Marina houses some of the most unique species of animals in the world. However, many of them are also very dangerous and perhaps deadly. On the west side of the road is the west City Wall, which runs parallel to Adlermann Way.
